block.title: Setup
block.text: Splunk DB Connect is a SQL database extension for Splunk that allows you to connect to, query, and update data in external SQL databases. <script type="text/javascript"> $(function(){ $.getScript(Splunk.util.make_url('static','app','dbx','manager','setup.js')); }); </script>

block.title: Java
block.text: Splunk DB Connect requires at least a Java Runtime Environment (JRE or JDK) version 1.6 or higher.
Enter the installation directory of your Java Runtime Environment.

Adjusting the JVM command line options allow you modify certain characteristics of the Java application like heap space size (max. memory consumption).
Example: -Xmx2G: Set the max. heap space to 2 GB
